nodes.id: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

zh-cn: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案
en: Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill 2019

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府提交香港立法会审议的一项法律草案，旨在向中国内地、澳门和台湾等司法管辖区移交嫌疑人。该草案是反对逃犯条例修订草案运动爆发的直接导火线。
description.en: A bill submitted by the Hong Kong SAR Government to the Legislative Council for deliberation, aimed at extraditing suspects to jurisdictions including mainland China, Macau, and Taiwan. The bill was the direct trigger for the 2019 anti-extradition bill protests.

description.zh-cn: 香港的行政机关。
description.en: The executive authorities of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，时任保安局局长，负责推动《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案》的立法工作。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who was the Secretary for Security at the time, responsible for promoting the legislative work of the 'Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill 2019'.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，时任香港特别行政区行政长官，推动了《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案》。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who was the Chief Executive of Hong Kong at the time, and promoted the 'Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill 2019'.

nodes.id: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

zh-cn: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 因《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案》而引发的一系列社会运动。
description.en: A series of social movements triggered by the 'Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill 2019'.

description.zh-cn: 2018年发生在台湾的一起谋杀案，受害者和嫌疑人均为香港居民。此案成为香港政府提出《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案》的直接原因。
description.en: A murder case that occurred in Taiwan in 2018, where both the victim and the suspect were Hong Kong residents. This case became the direct reason for the Hong Kong government to propose the 'Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill 2019'.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.en: The central administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party and the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 2019年6月9日香港反对逃犯条例修订草案游行

zh-cn: 2019年6月9日香港反对逃犯条例修订草案游行

description.zh-cn: 一次大规模游行，旨在抗议《逃犯条例》修订草案。
description.en: A large-scale march to protest against the extradition bill amendment.

nodes.id: 2019年6月12日香港反对逃犯条例修订草案占领行动

zh-cn: 2019年6月12日香港反对逃犯条例修订草案占领行动

description.zh-cn: 示威者包围立法会大楼，旨在阻止《逃犯条例》修订草案二读。
description.en: Protesters surrounded the Legislative Council Complex to prevent the second reading of the extradition bill.

description.zh-cn: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动中示威者提出的一系列政治诉求。
description.en: A set of political demands made by protesters during the 2019-2020 Hong Kong protests.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与英国就香港问题共同发表的一份声明。
description.en: A joint declaration signed between the People's Republic of China and the United Kingdom on the issue of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，曾在香港主权移交前夕担任英国外交大臣。
description.en: A British politician who served as the UK Foreign Secretary on the eve of the handover of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 潘晓颖命案的受害者。
description.en: The victim of the Poon Hiu-wing murder case.

description.zh-cn: 潘晓颖命案的嫌疑人。
description.en: The suspect in the Poon Hiu-wing murder case.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央政治局常委、中央港澳工作协调小组组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, then a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and head of the Central Coordination Group for Hong Kong and Macau Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主党成员，时任立法会议员，在《逃犯条例》法案委员会中担任主持。
description.en: A member of the Democratic Party of Hong Kong and a then Legislative Council member who presided over the bills committee for the extradition bill.

description.zh-cn: 香港工会联合会议员，在《逃犯条例》法案委员会会议期间与涂谨申发生冲突。
description.en: A member of the Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions who clashed with James To during a meeting of the extradition bill's bills committee.

description.zh-cn: 香港建制派立法会议员，被建制派推举主持《逃犯条例》法案委员会主席选举。
description.en: A pro-establishment Legislative Council member in Hong Kong, nominated by the pro-establishment camp to preside over the election of the chairman of the extradition bill's bills committee.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一个政治派别，通常支持中华人民共和国中央政府和香港特别行政区政府。
description.en: A political alignment in Hong Kong that generally supports the Central People's Government and the Hong Kong SAR Government.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一个政治派别，主张在香港争取更广泛的民主制度。
description.en: A political alignment in Hong Kong that advocates for broader democratic systems in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统，对《逃犯条例》修订表示强烈反对。
description.en: President of the Republic of China, who expressed strong opposition to the amendment of the extradition bill.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国驻英国大使。
description.en: Then Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 一个由27个欧洲成员国组成的政治和经济联盟。
description.en: A political and economic union of 27 member states that are located primarily in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 由世界七个主要发达国家组成的国际组织。
description.en: An international organization consisting of the world's seven largest advanced economies.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，曾就《逃犯条例》修订草案申请司法覆核。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman who once applied for a judicial review against the extradition bill amendment.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府宣布提交修订《逃犯条例》及《刑事事宜相互法律协助条例》的草案。
description.en: The Hong Kong SAR Government announced the submission of a bill to amend the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance and the Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Ordinance.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 时任保安局局长李家超于2019年3月29日正式引入《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案》。
description.en: Then-Secretary for Security John Lee officially introduced the 'Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill 2019' on March 29, 2019.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 香港政府声称，修订《逃犯条例》的提案源于潘晓颖命案，旨在填补法律漏洞。
description.en: The Hong Kong government claimed that the proposal to amend the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance originated from the Poon Hiu-wing murder case, aiming to plug legal loopholes.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 根据路透社报道，修订《逃犯条例》由中共中央纪委倡议。
description.en: According to Reuters, the amendment to the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance was initiated by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CCP.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 时任香港行政长官林郑月娥推动了《逃犯条例》的修订工作。
description.en: Then-Chief Executive of Hong Kong Carrie Lam promoted the amendment of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 林郑月娥声称修订条例得到中央人民政府的理解、尊重和支持。
description.en: Carrie Lam claimed that the amendment received understanding, respect, and support from the Central People's Government.

relationships.source: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案
relationships.target: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 该条例草案的修订是反对逃犯条例修订草案运动爆发的导火线。
description.en: The amendment of this bill was the trigger for the outbreak of the anti-extradition bill protests.

relationships.source: 2019年6月12日香港反对逃犯条例修订草案占领行动
relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 示威者包围立法会大楼以阻止条例二读，导致当日会议取消，恢复二读的程序被押后。
description.en: Protesters surrounded the Legislative Council Complex to prevent the second reading of the bill, leading to the cancellation of the meeting that day and the postponement of the second reading process.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 2019年9月4日，行政长官林郑月娥发表电视讲话，宣布正式撤回条例草案。
description.en: On September 4, 2019, Chief Executive Carrie Lam delivered a televised address announcing the formal withdrawal of the bill.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月23日，保安局局长李家超在立法会大会上正式宣布撤回修例。
description.en: On October 23, 2019, Secretary for Security John Lee formally announced the withdrawal of the bill amendment in the Legislative Council meeting.

description.zh-cn: 林郑月娥在宣布撤回条例修订草案前，征得了中共中央总书记习近平的批准。
description.en: Before announcing the withdrawal of the bill amendment, Carrie Lam sought and obtained approval from CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 聂伟敬发表评论文章，指出《逃犯条例》修订违反了《中英联合声明》的承诺。
description.en: Malcolm Rifkind published a commentary article pointing out that the amendment to the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance violated the commitments of the Sino-British Joint Declaration.

description.zh-cn: 陈同佳在台湾杀害了其女友潘晓颖。
description.en: Chan Tong-kai murdered his girlfriend Poon Hiu-wing in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，韩正在深圳与林郑月娥商讨修例事件，之后林郑月娥决定暂缓修例。
description.en: It was reported that Han Zheng met with Carrie Lam in Shenzhen to discuss the extradition bill issue, after which Lam decided to suspend the bill.

description.zh-cn: 在法案委员会首次会议上，郭伟强因批评涂谨申“扮垃圾”而被其逐出会议厅。
description.en: During the first meeting of the bills committee, Kwok Wai-keung was expelled from the chamber by James To after criticizing him for 'acting like rubbish'.

description.zh-cn: 建制派议员联署，要求改由石礼谦主持法案委员会主席选举。
description.en: Pro-establishment lawmakers signed a petition requesting that Abraham Shek preside over the election of the bills committee chairman.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 欧盟向香港政府发出外交照会，抗议修订《逃犯条例》。
description.en: The European Union issued a diplomatic démarche to the Hong Kong government to protest the amendment of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 刘銮雄向高等法院申请司法覆核，挑战《逃犯条例》修订草案的合宪性，后于5月29日撤回申请。
description.en: Joseph Lau applied for a judicial review at the High Court to challenge the constitutionality of the extradition bill amendment, but withdrew the application on May 29.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 七国集团发表联合声明，重申《中英联合声明》的存在与重要性，并呼吁避免暴力，对修例风波表达了间接立场。
description.en: The G7 issued a joint statement reaffirming the existence and importance of the Sino-British Joint Declaration and calling for the avoidance of violence, indirectly stating its position on the extradition bill controversy.
